docs.snippet: A spokesman for President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia said the New England Patriots’ owner, Robert Kraft, meant for a diamond-encrusted Super Bowl ring to be a gift to Mr. Putin eight years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: A spokesman for President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia said the New England Patriots’ owner, Robert Kraft, meant for a diamond-encrusted Super Bowl ring to be a gift to Mr. Putin eight years ago.

headline.main: Kraft’s Super Bowl Ring Said to Be a Gift to Putin

docs.lead_paragraph: In the 78th minute, Mario Balotelli collected a perfectly placed pass to break a tie, helping to propel Italy to a victory over Mexico on Sunday in the FIFA Confederations Cup.

headline.main: Italy Powers Past Mexico in Confederations Cup
